title: 2 x 500ml Sugar Soap Spray – Powerful Multi-Surface Cleaner & Degreaser | Pre-Paint Wall Cleaner, Removes Grease, Grime & Nicotine | Ready to Use Household Cleaning Spray
features: SUGAR SOAP SPRAY MULTI-SURFACE CLEANER: This 2 x 500ml sugar soap spray is ideal for cleaning walls, tiles, kitchen counters, and appliances. Cuts through grease, grime, nicotine, and everyday dirt fast.

PRE-PAINT WALL CLEANER FOR SURFACE PREP: Use this heavy-duty surface cleaner before painting to remove dirt, grease, and nicotine. Prepares walls and surfaces for smooth paint adhesion and a clean finish.

POWERFUL GREASE REMOVER FOR KITCHEN USE: Effectively dissolves tough grease, grime, and residue on cookers, cabinets, and splashbacks. Ideal for kitchens and high-use areas that build up stubborn dirt.
READY TO USE SUGAR SOAP FORMULA: No mixing required. Each 500ml spray bottle comes pre-diluted—just spray and wipe for a residue-free finish on interior walls, woodwork, tiles, and more.
ALL-PURPOSE CLEANER FOR HOME IMPROVEMENT: This multi-surface degreaser is perfect for general household cleaning or DIY prep work. Essential for decorators, painters, and everyday cleaning tasks.
description: Product description 2 x 500ml Sugar Soap Spray – Powerful Multi-Surface Cleaner & Degreaser for Pre-Paint Cleaning Our 2 x 500ml Sugar Soap Spray is the ultimate cleaning solution for your home. This ready-to-use household cleaner and degreaser is perfect for tackling tough grime, grease, nicotine, and dirt, making it ideal for both pre-paint cleaning and general cleaning tasks around the house. Formulated to work on multiple surfaces , this sugar soap spray is highly effective at removing stubborn residues from walls, kitchen surfaces, appliances, and more. Its powerful formula effortlessly breaks down grease, grime, and nicotine buildup, providing a clean, smooth surface ready for painting or any other home improvement projects. Whether you're preparing your walls for a fresh coat of paint or simply need to clean greasy kitchen surfaces, this cleaner will do the job. The multi-surface cleaner is safe for a variety of surfaces, including walls, tiles, and counters, making it a versatile tool in any cleaning routine. With this 2 x 500ml sugar soap spray , you can tackle your toughest cleaning jobs with ease. Its fast-acting formula ensures that your home is left spotless, with no greasy residue left behind. Key Features: 2 x 500ml ready-to-use sugar soap spray for powerful cleaning of multiple surfaces Effectively removes grease, grime, dirt, and nicotine, leaving surfaces clean and ready for painting Perfect for pre-paint cleaning, ensuring a smooth Ingredients Trisodium Nitrilotriacetate
